Title: Requires the commissioner of taxation and finance to conduct a study on how successful property tax grievances have been over the prior three years throughout the state
Summary: Requires the commissioner of taxation and finance to conduct a study on how successful property tax grievances have been over the prior three years throughout the state.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the commissioner of taxation and finance to conduct a study on how successful property tax grievances have been over the prior three years throughout the state
